SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT586
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an account servicer (account servicing institution) to an account owner or its designated agent. The account servicer may be a local agent (sub-custodian) acting on behalf of their global custodian customer, or a custodian acting on behalf of an investment management institution or a broker/dealer.
It is used to provide, as at a specified time, details of pending settlement allegements, for all or selected securities in a specified safekeeping account.
When bilaterally agreed, this message may also be sent by an account servicer to another account servicer. The account servicers may be local agents or global custodians acting on behalf of an investment management institution, a broker/dealer or a retail client .
Sent with sub-function :23G::NEWM/PORT, it is used for the exchange of settlement details information during a retail or institutional client portfolio transfer. By exchange of settlement details , it is understood the providing, by the delivering account servicer to the receiving account servicer, of the settlement details (trade date, settlement date, delivering parties, and place of settlement) of the individual transfers that will take place during a full or partial portfolio transfer.
This message may also be used to respond to a request for statement/status advice (ie, the MT 549) and to report that there are pending settlement allegements.

Validation.Comment: Continuation Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T97) :

Code.Name: LAST
Code.Description: Last page of a statement with more than one page.

Code.Name: MORE
Code.Description: Intermediate page of a statement which contains additional pages.

Code.Name: ONLY
Code.Description: Only page of the statement.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Message requesting the cancellation of a previously sent message.

Code.Name: NEWM
Code.Description: New message.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: PORT
Code.Description: The Statement of Settlement Allegements relates to a client portfolio move from an account servicer to another .

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
If Qualifier is CODE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: COMP
Code.Description: Statement gives complete information (including information (positions, instruction statuses) which is unchanged).

Code.Name: DELT
Code.Description: Statement contains changes which have not yet been reported (delta report, ie, changes only).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SFRE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ADHO
Code.Description: Statement is sent following a request by the Receiver.

Code.Name: DAIL
Code.Description: Statement is sent daily (once per day, end-of-day).

Code.Name: INDA
Code.Description: Statement is sent intra-day (multiple reports during the day).

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Statement is sent monthly (once per month).

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Statement is sent weekly (once per week).

Code.Name: YEAR
Code.Description: Statement is sent yearly (once per year).

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. (Error code(s): T26) .
Flag must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K17) :

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: ASRF, COLR, COMM, MITI, PCTI, POOL, PREV, RELA, TRRF
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
If Qualifier is ALLE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Allegement has been cancelled since the previous delta statement. The allegement was cancelled because of a mistake by the sender or because the alleging party cancelled its instruction.

Code.Name: REMO
Code.Description: Allegement has been removed since the previous delta statement. The allegement was removed because the alleged party sent its instruction.

Validation.Comment: Narrative must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
When Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94) :

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Place of trade is a stock exchange.

Code.Name: OTCO
Code.Description: Place of trade is over the counter.

Code.Name: PRIM
Code.Description: Place of trade is the primary market.

Code.Name: SECM
Code.Description: Place of trade is the secondary market.

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Trade was executed on various places.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
In option B, if Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98) :

Code.Name: WISS
Code.Description: Settlement is to be done when the security is issued.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is TRAD and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98) :

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Partial trades have occurred over a period of two or more days.

Validation.Comment: Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
In option B, Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90) :

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
In option A, Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90) :

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, eg, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, eg, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Number must not be zero . (Error code(s): T14) .

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: Narrative must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
In option B, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94) :

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Place of listing is a stock exchange.

Code.Name: OTCO
Code.Description: Place of listing is over the counter.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is CFRE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ANNU
Code.Description: Annual payment cycle.

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Monthly payment cycle.

Code.Name: QUTR
Code.Description: Quarterly payment cycle.

Code.Name: SEMI
Code.Description: Semi-annual payment cycle.

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Weekly payment cycle.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is FORM and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BEAR
Code.Description: Financial instruments are in bearer form.

Code.Name: REGD
Code.Description: Financial instruments are in registered form.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is MICO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: A001
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February, and provided that the interest period started on a 30th or a 31st. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th if the period started on a 30th or a 31st and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). It is the most commonly used 30/360 method for US straight and convertible bonds.

Code.Name: A002
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month in a way similar to the 30/360 (basic rule) and a 365-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th).

Code.Name: A003
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month in a way similar to the 30/360 (basic rule) and the assumed number of days in a year in a way similar to the Actual/Actual (ICMA). Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). The assumed number of days in a year is computed as the actual number of days in the coupon period multiplied by the number of interest payments in the year.

Code.Name: A004
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period and a 360-day year.

Code.Name: A005
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period and a 365-day year.

Code.Name: A006
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and the assumed number of days in a year, ie, the actual number of days in the coupon period multiplied by the number of interest payments in the year. If the coupon period is irregular (first or last coupon), it is extended or split into quasi interest periods that have the length of a regular coupon period and the computation is operated separately on each quasi interest period and the intermediate results are summed up.

Code.Name: A007
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be equivalent to a 30 Feb. However, if the last day of the maturity coupon period is the last day of February, it will not be assumed to be a 30th. It is a variation of the 30/360 (ICMA) method commonly used for eurobonds. The usage of this variation is only relevant when the coupon periods are scheduled to end on the last day of the month.

Code.Name: A008
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days of the interest period that fall on a normal year, divided by 365, added to the actual number of days of the interest period that fall on a leap year, divided by 366.

Code.Name: A009
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and a 365-day year (if the coupon payment date is NOT in a leap year) or a 366-day year (if the coupon payment date is in a leap year).

Code.Name: A010
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and a 366-day year (if 29 Feb falls in the coupon period) or a 365-day year (if 29 Feb does not fall in the coupon period). If a coupon period is longer than one year, it is split by repetitively separating full year sub-periods counting backwards from the end of the coupon period (a year backwards from a 28 Feb being 29 Feb, if it exists). The first of the sub-periods starts on the start date of the accrued interest period and thus is possibly shorter than a year. Then the interest computation is operated separately on each sub-period and the intermediate results are summed up.

Code.Name: A011
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). It is the most commonly used 30/360 method for non-US straight and convertible bonds issued before 01/01/1999.

Code.Name: A012
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for the last day of February whose day of the month value shall be adapted to the value of the first day of the interest period if the latter is higher and if the period is one of a regular schedule. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28th Feb of a non-leap year is assumed to be equivalent to a 29th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 29th, or to a 30th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 30th or a 31st. The 29th Feb of a leap year is assumed to be equivalent to a 30th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 30th or a 31st. Similarly, if the coupon period starts on the last day of February, it is assumed to produce only one day of interest in February as if it was starting on a 30th Feb when the end of the period is a 30th or a 31st, or two days of interest in February when the end of the period is a 29th, or 3 days of interest in February when it is the 28th Feb of a non-leap year and the end of the period is before the 29th.

Code.Name: A013
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be equivalent to a 30 Feb. It is a variation of the 30E/360 (or Eurobond basis) method where the last day of February is always assumed to be a 30th, even if it is the last day of the maturity coupon period.

Code.Name: A014
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period, excluding any leap day from the count, and a 365-day year.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Other method than A001-A014 . See Narrative.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PAYS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: FULL
Code.Description: Financial instrument is fully paid.

Code.Name: NILL
Code.Description: Financial instrument is nil paid.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Financial instrument is partially paid.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PFRE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ANNU
Code.Description: Payment frequency is annual.

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Payment frequency is monthly.

Code.Name: QUTR
Code.Description: Payment frequency is quarterly.

Code.Name: SEMI
Code.Description: Payment frequency is semi-annual.

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Payment frequency is weekly.

Validation.Comment: In option B, If Qualifier is OPST and Data Source Scheme is not present, Instrument Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K12) :

Code.Name: AMER
Code.Description: Option can be exercised before or on expiry date.

Code.Name: EURO
Code.Description: Option can be exercised on expiry date only.

Validation.Comment: In option B, If Qualifier is OPTI and Data Source Scheme is not present, Instrument Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K12) :

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: A right to buy a defined quantity of an asset by a certain date at an agreed price.

Code.Name: PUTO
Code.Description: A right to sell a defined quantity of an asset by a certain date at an agreed price.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .

Validation.Qualifiers: CALD, COUP, DDTE, EXPI, FCOU, FRNR, ISSU, MATU, PUTT
Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .

Validation.Qualifiers: CUFC, INDX, INTR, NWFC, NXRT, PRFC, YTMR
Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Rate must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Flag must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K17) :

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes.

Validation.Comment: In option B, Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90) :

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
In option A, Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90) :

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, eg, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, eg, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36) :

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: In option H, If Qualifier is PAYM, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: APMT
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is against payment.

Code.Name: FREE
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is free of payment.

Validation.Comment: In option H, If Qualifier is REDE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: DELI
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is a delivery.

Code.Name: RECE
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is a receipt.

Validation.Comment: In option F, If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is TTCO, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BCBL
Code.Description: Trade was executed on board lots; not set for odd lots (UK specific).

Code.Name: BCBN
Code.Description: Trade was executed on bad names, not set for good names (UK specific).

Code.Name: BCFD
Code.Description: Not for foreign registration when unset (UK specific).

Code.Name: BCPD
Code.Description: In country of incorporation when unset (UK specific).

Code.Name: BCRO
Code.Description: Result of option when set (UK specific).

Code.Name: BCRP
Code.Description: Result of repo when set (UK specific).

Code.Name: CBNS
Code.Description: Trade was executed cum bonus.

Code.Name: CCPN
Code.Description: Trade was executed cum coupon.

Code.Name: CDIV
Code.Description: Trade was executed cum dividend.

Code.Name: CRTS
Code.Description: Trade was executed cum rights.

Code.Name: CWAR
Code.Description: Trade was executed cum warrants.

Code.Name: GTDL
Code.Description: Delivery of the financial instrument on settlement date is guaranteed.

Code.Name: SPCU
Code.Description: Trade was executed with a special cum dividend, i.e., buying after the ex date and getting the dividend.

Code.Name: SPEX
Code.Description: Trade was executed with a special ex dividend, i.e., selling before the ex date without the coupon.

Code.Name: XBNS
Code.Description: Trade was executed ex bonus.

Code.Name: XCPN
Code.Description: Trade was executed ex coupon.

Code.Name: XDIV
Code.Description: Trade was executed ex dividend.

Code.Name: XRTS
Code.Description: Trade was executed ex rights.

Code.Name: XWAR
Code.Description: Trade was executed ex warrants.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PRIC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: AVER
Code.Description: Price is an average price.

Qualifier.Name: SETT
Qualifier.Description: Quantity of Financial Instrument to be Settled

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36) :

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: Country must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Narrative (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
In option B, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: In option F, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a local custodian.

Code.Name: ICSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at an International Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: NCSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a National Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

Qualifier.Name: LOTS
Qualifier.Description: Quantity of Financial Instrument In The Lot

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
In option A, Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, eg, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, eg, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: In option B, Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PRIC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: AVER
Code.Description: Price is an average price.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
In option B, when Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98) :

Code.Name: OPEN
Code.Description: Date/time has not been established.

Validation.Comment: Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
If Qualifier is RERT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: FIXE
Code.Description: Rate is fixed.

Code.Name: FORF
Code.Description: No specific rate applies to the transaction , only a forfeit.

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Rate is variable.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is LEGA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain the following code (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: FRAN
Code.Description: Relates to the French legal framework for repos, that is, relates to a "Pension Livrée".

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is OMAT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: MATA
Code.Description: Maturity date modification is allowed.

Code.Name: MATN
Code.Description: Maturity date modification is not allowed.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is INTR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: GIVE
Code.Description: Interest is paid to the collateral giver.

Code.Name: TAKE
Code.Description: Interest is paid to the collateral taker.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
When Sign is present, Rate must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43) .
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .
When Qualifier is BENE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NBEN
Code.Description: No Change of Beneficial Ownership (NCBO). If a standing instruction is in place for change of beneficial ownership (CBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YBEN
Code.Description: Change of Beneficial Ownership (CBO). If a standing instruction is in place for no change of beneficial ownership (NCBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is CASY and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: GROS
Code.Description: Settle money through gross settlement system.

Code.Name: NETS
Code.Description: Settle money through net settlement system.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is MACL and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CLNT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a client side transaction.

Code.Name: MAKT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a market side transaction.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is REGT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NREG
Code.Description: Hold the securities in street name. If there is a standing instruction in place to register on receipt, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YREG
Code.Description: Register on receipt. If there is a standing instruction in place to hold the securities in street name, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is REPT, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a repo collateral substitution.

Code.Name: TOPU
Code.Description: Relates to a cover of securities position due to deficit of collateral following mark to market valuation.

Code.Name: WTHD
Code.Description: Relates to a return of securities position due to excess of collateral following mark to market valuation.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is RTGS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the non-RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the RTGS instruction, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Code.Name: YRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the non-RTGS system, then this standing instruction is to be ignored.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SETR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BSBK
Code.Description: Relates to a buy sell back transaction .

Code.Name: CNCB
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral delivery/receipt to a National Central Bank for central bank credit operations.

Code.Name: COLI
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral taker or its agent.

Code.Name: COLO
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral giver or its agent.

Code.Name: NETT
Code.Description: Relates to the netting of settlement instructions.

Code.Name: OWNE
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving more than one instructing party (messages sender) and/or account servicer (messages receiver).

Code.Name: OWNI
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving one instructing party (messages sender) at one account servicer (messages receiver).

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a pair-off: the transaction is paired off and netted against one or more previous transactions.

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Relates to the placement/new issue of a financial instrument.

Code.Name: PORT
Code.Description: Relates to a portfolio move from one investment manager to another and/or from an account servicer to another. It is generally charged differently than another account transfer (OWNE, OWNI, INSP), hence the need to identify this type of transfer as such.

Code.Name: PREA
Code.Description: Relates to a pre-advice, i.e. for matching purposes only.

Code.Name: REAL
Code.Description: Relates to a realignment of positions.

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: Relates to a redemption of Funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: REPU
Code.Description: Relates to a repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: RVPO
Code.Description: Relates to a reverse repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: SECB
Code.Description: Relates to a securities borrowing operation.

Code.Name: SECL
Code.Description: Relates to a securities lending operation.

Code.Name: SUBS
Code.Description: Relates to a subscription to funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.Description: Relates to the settlement of a trade.

Code.Name: TRPO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TRVO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty reverse repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TURN
Code.Description: Relates to a turnaround: the same security is bought and sold to settle the same day, to or from different brokers.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is STCO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CLEN
Code.Description: Tax-exempt financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DIRT
Code.Description: Taxable financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DLWM
Code.Description: Matching receipt instruction not required (only for concerned ICSD and CSD).

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Settlement transactions relates to drawn securities.

Code.Name: NOMC
Code.Description: No market claim should be automatically generated.

Code.Name: NPAR
Code.Description: Partial settlement is not allowed.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Partial settlement is allowed.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Securities are to be physically settled.

Code.Name: SPDL
Code.Description: Settlement transactions to be settled with special delivery.

Code.Name: SPST
Code.Description: Money and financial instruments settle in different locations.

Option.Name: S
Option.Specification: (Qualifier) (Data Source Scheme) (Type of ID) (Country Code) (Alternate ID)

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R), Alternate ID (Format Option S) and Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line ( (Error code(s): T26) .
In option S, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Type of ID must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K95) :

Code.Name: ARNU
Code.Description: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.

Code.Name: CCPT
Code.Description: Number assigned by a passport authority.

Code.Name: CHTY
Code.Description: Number assigned to a tax exempt entity.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Number assigned to a corporate entity.

Code.Name: DRLC
Code.Description: Number assigned to a driver's licence.

Code.Name: FIIN
Code.Description: Number assigned to a foreign investor (other than the alien number).

Code.Name: TXID
Code.Description: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.

Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R), Alternate ID (Format Option S) and Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line ( Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R), Alternate ID (Format Option S) and Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line ( Error code(s): T26) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: ACRU, CHAR, COAX, DEAL, EXEC, LOCL, LOCO, OTHR, RESU, SETT, STAM, TRAX, WITH
Validation.Comment: The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43) .

Validation.Qualifiers: ACRU, CHAR, COAX, DEAL, EXEC, LOCL, LOCO, OTHR, RESU, SETT, STAM, TRAX, WITH
Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .

Validation.Qualifiers: ACRU, CHAR, COAX, DEAL, EXEC, LOCL, LOCO, OTHR, RESU, SETT, STAM, TRAX, WITH
Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
First Currency Code and Second Currency Code must be valid ISO 4217 currency codes (Error code(s): T52) .
First Currency Code and Second Currency Code must be valid ISO 4217 currency codes (Error code(s): T52) .

Option.Name: S
Option.Specification: (Qualifier) (Data Source Scheme) (Type of ID) (Country Code) (Alternate ID)

Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R), Alternate ID (Format Option S) and Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
When Data Source Scheme is not present, Type of ID must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K95) :

Code.Name: ARNU
Code.Description: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.

Code.Name: CCPT
Code.Description: Number assigned by a passport authority.

Code.Name: CHTY
Code.Description: Number assigned to a tax exempt entity.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Number assigned to a corporate entity.

Code.Name: DRLC
Code.Description: Number assigned to a driver's licence.

Code.Name: FIIN
Code.Description: Number assigned to a foreign investor (other than the alien number).

Code.Name: TXID
Code.Description: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.

Validation.Qualifiers: EXCH, INVE, MEOR, MERE, QFIN, TRAG, TRRE
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Validation.Qualifiers: EXCH, INVE, MEOR, MERE, QFIN, TRAG, TRRE
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R), Alternate ID (Format Option S) and Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: EXCH, INVE, MEOR, MERE, QFIN, TRAG, TRRE
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R), Alternate ID (Format Option S) and Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 If the Activity Flag (field :17B:ACTI) in sequence A General Information is N, then sequence B must not be present. Otherwise, sequence B is mandatory (Error code(s): E66).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the Activity Flag (field :17B:ACTI) in sequence A General Information is N, then sequence B must not be present. Otherwise, sequence B is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 If the instruction is against payment (:22H::PAYM//APMT) then it is mandatory to specify a Settlement Amount (field :19A::SETT). This rule applies to sequence B (Error code(s): E83).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the instruction is against payment (:22H::PAYM//APMT) then it is mandatory to specify a Settlement Amount (field :19A::SETT)."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A1
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A1 Within each occurrence of sequence B ACRU cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B ACRU cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A2
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A2 Within each occurrence of sequence B CHAR cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B CHAR cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A4
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A4 Within each occurrence of sequence B DEAL cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B DEAL cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A5
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A5 Within each occurrence of sequence B EXEC cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B EXEC cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A8
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A8 Within each occurrence of sequence B LOCL cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B LOCL cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A9
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A9 Within each occurrence of sequence B LOCO cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B LOCO cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A11
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A11 Within each occurrence of sequence B OTHR cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B OTHR cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A14
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A14 Within each occurrence of sequence B SETT cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B SETT cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A17
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A17 Within each occurrence of sequence B STAM cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B STAM cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A20
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A20 Within each occurrence of sequence B TRAX cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B TRAX cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A22
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A22 Within each occurrence of sequence B WITH cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B WITH cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A23
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-A23 Within each occurrence of sequence B COAX cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E87).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B COAX cannot appear in more than one occurrence of the amounts subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 If an exchange rate (field :92B::EXCH) is present, the corresponding resulting amount (field :19A::RESU) must be present in the same subsequence. If the exchange rate is not present then the resulting amount is not allowed. This check applies within each occurrence of subsequence B5b (Error code(s): E62).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If an exchange rate (field :92B::EXCH) is present, the corresponding resulting amount (field :19A::RESU) must be present in the same subsequence. If the exchange rate is not present then the resulting amount is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A1
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A1 BUYR cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "BUYR cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A2
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A2 DEAG cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "DEAG cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A3
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A3 DECU cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "DECU cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A4
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A4 DEI1 cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "DEI1 cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A5 DEI2 cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "DEI2 cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A6
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A6 PSET cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "PSET cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A7
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A7 REAG cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "REAG cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A8
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A8 RECU cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "RECU cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A9
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A9 REI1 cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "REI1 cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A10
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A10 REI2 cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "REI2 cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A11
fieldvalidation.comment: C5-A11 SELL cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "SELL cannot appear more than once in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C6-A
fieldvalidation.comment: C6-A Within each occurrence of sequence B, if the allegement is a delivery (:22H::REDE//DELI in sequence B), then it is mandatory to specify a delivering agent: one occurrence of subsequence B5a Settlement Parties must contain party field :95a::DEAG (Error code(s): E85).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B, if the allegement is a delivery (:22H::REDE//DELI in sequence B), then it is mandatory to specify a delivering agent: one occurrence of subsequence B5a Settlement Parties must contain party field :95a::DEAG"

fieldvalidation.name: C6-B
fieldvalidation.comment: C6-B Within each occurrence of sequence B, if the allegement is a receipt (:22H::REDE//RECE in sequence B), then it is mandatory to specify a Receiving Agent: One occurrence of subsequence B5a Settlement Parties must contain party field :95a::REAG (Error code(s): E85).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B, if the allegement is a receipt (:22H::REDE//RECE in sequence B), then it is mandatory to specify a Receiving Agent: One occurrence of subsequence B5a Settlement Parties must contain party field :95a::REAG"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-A1
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-A1 If :95a::DEI2 is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::DEI1 must be present in another subseq B5a (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::DEI2 is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::DEI1 must be present in another subseq B5a."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-A2
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-A2 If :95a::DEI1 is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::DECU must be present in another subseq B5a (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::DEI1 is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::DECU must be present in another subseq B5a."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-A3
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-A3 If :95a::DECU is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::SELL must be present in another subseq B5a (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::DECU is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::SELL must be present in another subseq B5a."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-B1
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-B1 If :95a::REI2 is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::REI1 must be present in another subseq B5a (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::REI2 is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::REI1 must be present in another subseq B5a."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-B2
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-B2 If :95a::REI1 is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::RECU must be present in another subseq B5a (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::REI1 is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::RECU must be present in another subseq B5a."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-B3
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-B3 If :95a::RECU is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::BUYR must be present in another subseq B5a (Error code(s): E86).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If :95a::RECU is present in subseq B5a, then :95a::BUYR must be present in another subseq B5a."

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.comment: C8 If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed (Error code(s): E08).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: C9 In subsequence B5a, if field :95a::PSET is present, then field :97a::SAFE is not allowed in the same subsequence (Error code(s): E52).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In subsequence B5a, if field :95a::PSET is present, then field :97a::SAFE is not allowed in the same subsequence"

fieldvalidation.name: C10
fieldvalidation.comment: C10 A value date must only be provided for cash/securities split settlement. That is, in any occurrence of subsequence B5b, if value date field :98a::VALU is present, then in subsequence B5 field :22F::STCO//SPST must be present, and settlement amount field :19A::SETT must be present in the same subsequence B5b (Error code(s): C28).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "A value date must only be provided for cash/securities split settlement. That is, in any occurrence of subsequence B5b, if value date field :98a::VALU is present, then in subsequence B5 field :22F::STCO//SPST must be present, and settlement amount field :19A::SETT must be present in the same subsequence B5b."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-35B-B ISIN is used at the beginning of Identification of Security (Subfield 1) and must be composed of uppercase letters only (Error code(s): T12).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: B.F35B.Identification_Of_Security + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-B1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: Split("\r\n", $value.Description_Of_Security)[0] + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";

fieldvalidation.name: FB2-35B-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FB2-35B-B ISIN is used at the beginning of Identification of Security (Subfield 1) and must be composed of uppercase letters only (Error code(s): T12).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: B.B2.F35B.Identification_Of_Security + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB2-35B-B1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: Split("\r\n", $value.Description_Of_Security)[0] + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";
